long_description: simcon homes has been a quality home builder in northeast ohio for over 50 years. quality built for over 50 years simcon homes can build your custom home using your own plans, or our designer will help bring your vision to life. get started winner x2 best overall custom home our story a trusted legacy in ne ohio simcon homes has been a quality home builder in northeast ohio forâ€¦. our focus is using a combination of quality materials and fine craftsmanship along with a superior house design. simcon homes has been a family-owned business for more than 50 years, spanning across 3 generations. since then, rodney has expanded simcon to what it is today by building hundreds of homes throughout many northeast ohio suburbs. rodney has proudly grown the business that his late father started in 1970, by not only building custom homes, but also adding remodeling, renovations & additions, and commercial project management to simcon's portfolio of capabilities. with a new generation quickly learning the ropes, simcon homes not only hopes to grow and expand its capabilities and presence throughout northeast ohio, but most importantly, continue to make our customers' dreams a reality for years to come.

generated_description: simcon homes, legally known as simcon homes building company llc., based in the woodlands, texas, is a family-owned business specializing in custom home building and remodeling. founded in 1970 by larry simon, the company has been in operation for over 50 years, spanning three generations. simcon homes focuses on using high-quality materials and fine craftsmanship to ensure superior house designs. the company offers services including custom home construction, remodeling, renovations, and commercial project management. rodney simon, who joined the family business after graduating from ohio university, has expanded simcon homes to build hundreds of homes throughout northeast ohio. the company is known for its commitment to quality and customer satisfaction.
